name: Happy Little HELL Farm
description:
The Devil demands that you do his vegetable gardening to reclaim your soul.

Grow and then harvest the required plants before the time runs out. 

Survive the ensuing chaos. 

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

E to interact when prompted

Left Click to use your equipped tool

1, 2, 3, 4, 5 to switch between tools 

Tools 1Scythe Use to harvest plants, clear vines, and to defend yourself2PickaxeUse to clear rock formations3RakeUse to prepare the ground for planting4Watering Can Use to water plants and put out fires (Refill at well)5Seed bagUse to plant seeds, color indicates carried seed type CREDITS Salt (tfx) - Music and SoundZope - Development, Shaders, ParticlesUlfgar - ArtXuubasa - Code and Implementation hiijcat - Art
